rooms.description: Welcome area with reception area and storage. Designed to welcome positive energy following Vastu.
Spacious open-plan living room adjoining dining area, ensuring unobstructed view from the front corner for auspicious sunlight.
Adjacent to the living area with a kitchenette bar for hosting small gatherings. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning seating.
Modern kitchen located adjacent to dining room, ensuring efficient workflow and good air circulation as per Indian standards.
Private master bedroom with attached bathroom. Placed on the eastern side to harness morning sunlight.
Second bedroom for children or guests, ensuring balance and harmony in spatial layout.
Additional bedroom with ample natural light from the front side. Designed according to Vastu principles for calmness.
Primary bathroom shared by master bedroom, designed for privacy and comfort.
Dedicated home theater space with soundproof walls and seating arrangements. Utilizes the corner plot advantage for immersive experience.

openings.description: Main entrance leading to the reception area and living room, ensuring Vastu alignment.
Large windows installed on east side for maximum morning sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.
Sliding door for seamless connectivity between kitchen and dining area.
